## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added type hints where appropriate

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms/browsers (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes

### Security

- [ ] My changes don't introduce any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I haven't committed any secrets or sensitive information
- [ ] I have run security checks (bandit, safety)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt if I added new dependencies
- [ ] All dependencies are pinned to specific versions
- [ ] I have checked for dependency conflicts
